def_cn: 变得僵硬;变得紧张;绷紧
def_en: If you stiffen, you stop moving and stand or sit with muscles that are suddenly tense, for example because you feel afraid or angry.

def_cn: (肌肉或关节)变得僵硬;(使)变得不易弯曲;(使)变得不灵活
def_en: If your muscles or joints stiffen, or if something stiffens them, they become difficult to bend or move.

def_cn: (态度或行为)变得更强硬，变得更严厉;(使)变得更坚定
def_en: If attitudes or behaviour stiffen, or if something stiffens them, they become stronger or more severe, and less likely to be changed.
If something such as cloth is stiffened, it is made firm so that it does not bend easily.
